segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1

segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1

segment.source: What's New in UE-V 2.1
segment.target: What's New in UE-V 2.1

segment.source: User Experience Virtualization 2.1 provides these new features and functionality compared to UE-V 2.0.
segment.target: User Experience Virtualization 2.1 provides these new features and functionality compared to UE-V 2.0.

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.1 Release Notes provide more information about the UE-V 2.1 release.
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.1 Release Notes provide more information about the UE-V 2.1 release.

segment.source: Office 2013 Settings Location Template
segment.target: Office 2013 Settings Location Template

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 includes the Microsoft Office 2013 settings location template with improved Outlook signature support.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 includes the Microsoft Office 2013 settings location template with improved Outlook signature support.

segment.source: In UE-V 2.1, the signature data synchronizes between user devices.
segment.target: In UE-V 2.1, the signature data synchronizes between user devices.

segment.source: We’ve added synchronization of default signature settings for new, reply, and forwarded emails.
segment.target: We’ve added synchronization of default signature settings for new, reply, and forwarded emails.

segment.source: Customers no longer have to choose the default signature settings.
segment.target: Customers no longer have to choose the default signature settings.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: An Outlook profile must be created for any device on which a user wants to sync their Outlook signature.
segment.target: An Outlook profile must be created for any device on which a user wants to sync their Outlook signature.

segment.source: If the profile is not already created, the user can create one and then restart Outlook on that device to enable signature synchronization.
segment.target: If the profile is not already created, the user can create one and then restart Outlook on that device to enable signature synchronization.

segment.source: Previously UE-V included Microsoft Office 2010 settings location templates that were automatically distributed and registered with the UE-V Agent.
segment.target: Previously UE-V included Microsoft Office 2010 settings location templates that were automatically distributed and registered with the UE-V Agent.

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 works with Office 365 to determine whether Office 2013 settings are roamed by Office 365.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 works with Office 365 to determine whether Office 2013 settings are roamed by Office 365.

segment.source: If settings are roamed by Office 365 they are not roamed by UE-V.
segment.target: If settings are roamed by Office 365 they are not roamed by UE-V.

segment.source: Overview of user and roaming settings for Office 2013 provides more information.
segment.target: Overview of user and roaming settings for Office 2013 provides more information.

segment.source: To enable settings synchronization using UE-V 2.1, do one of the following:
segment.target: To enable settings synchronization using UE-V 2.1, do one of the following:

segment.source: Use Group Policy to disable Office 365 synchronization
segment.target: Use Group Policy to disable Office 365 synchronization

segment.source: Do not enable the Office 365 synchronization experience during Office 2013 installation
segment.target: Do not enable the Office 365 synchronization experience during Office 2013 installation

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 ships Office 2013 and Office 2010 templates.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 ships Office 2013 and Office 2010 templates.

segment.source: This release removes the Office 2007 templates.
segment.target: This release removes the Office 2007 templates.

segment.source: Users can still use Office 2007 templates from UE-V 2.0 or earlier and can still get the templates from the UE-V template gallery located here.
segment.target: Users can still use Office 2007 templates from UE-V 2.0 or earlier and can still get the templates from the UE-V template gallery located here.

segment.source: Fix for Distributed File System Namespace Users
segment.target: Fix for Distributed File System Namespace Users

segment.source: UE-V has improved Distributed File System Namespace (DFSN) support by adding a UE-V configuration called SyncProviderPingEnabled.
segment.target: UE-V has improved Distributed File System Namespace (DFSN) support by adding a UE-V configuration called SyncProviderPingEnabled.

segment.source: Disabling this configuration using PowerShell or WMI allows users to disable the UE-V ping.
segment.target: Disabling this configuration using PowerShell or WMI allows users to disable the UE-V ping.

segment.source: The UE-V ping causes an error when using DFSN servers because these servers do not respond to pings.
segment.target: The UE-V ping causes an error when using DFSN servers because these servers do not respond to pings.

segment.source: The non-response prevents UE-V from synchronizing settings.
segment.target: The non-response prevents UE-V from synchronizing settings.

segment.source: Disabling the UE-V ping allows UE-V synchronization to work normally.
segment.target: Disabling the UE-V ping allows UE-V synchronization to work normally.

segment.source: To disable UE-V ping, use this PowerShell cmdlet:
segment.target: To disable UE-V ping, use this PowerShell cmdlet:

segment.source: Synchronization for Credentials
segment.target: Synchronization for Credentials

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 gives customers the ability to synchronize credentials and certificates stored in the Windows Credential Manager.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 gives customers the ability to synchronize credentials and certificates stored in the Windows Credential Manager.

segment.source: This component is disabled by default.
segment.target: This component is disabled by default.

segment.source: Enabling this component lets users keep their domain credentials and certificates in sync.
segment.target: Enabling this component lets users keep their domain credentials and certificates in sync.

segment.source: Users can sign in one time on a device, and these credentials will roam for that user across all of their UE-V enabled devices.
segment.target: Users can sign in one time on a device, and these credentials will roam for that user across all of their UE-V enabled devices.

segment.source: Manage Credentials with UE-V 2.1 provides more information.
segment.target: Manage Credentials with UE-V 2.1 provides more information.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, Credential Manager contains web credentials.
segment.target: In Windows 8 and later, Credential Manager contains web credentials.

segment.source: These credentials are not synchronized between users’ devices.
segment.target: These credentials are not synchronized between users’ devices.

segment.source: UE-V and Microsoft Account Synchronization
segment.target: UE-V and Microsoft Account Synchronization

segment.source: UE-V detects if “Sync settings with OneDrive”, also known as Microsoft Account synchronization, is on.
segment.target: UE-V detects if “Sync settings with OneDrive”, also known as Microsoft Account synchronization, is on.

segment.source: If the Microsoft Account is not configured to synchronize settings, UE-V synchronizes Windows apps, AppX packages, and Windows desktop settings between devices.
segment.target: If the Microsoft Account is not configured to synchronize settings, UE-V synchronizes Windows apps, AppX packages, and Windows desktop settings between devices.

segment.source: This lets users access their Store apps, music, pictures and other Microsoft Account-enabled applications without syncing outside of the enterprise firewall.
segment.target: This lets users access their Store apps, music, pictures and other Microsoft Account-enabled applications without syncing outside of the enterprise firewall.

segment.source: UE-V checks whether Group Policy will stop synchronizing settings with OneDrive or if the user disables Sync your settings on this computer in the user controls.
segment.target: UE-V checks whether Group Policy will stop synchronizing settings with OneDrive or if the user disables Sync your settings on this computer in the user controls.

segment.source: Support for the SyncMethod External
segment.target: Support for the SyncMethod External

segment.source: A new SyncMethod configuration called External specifies that if UE-V settings are written to a local folder on the user computer, then any external sync engine (such as OneDrive for Business, Work Folders, Sharepoint, or Dropbox) can be used to apply these settings to the different computers that users access.
segment.target: A new SyncMethod configuration called External specifies that if UE-V settings are written to a local folder on the user computer, then any external sync engine (such as OneDrive for Business, Work Folders, Sharepoint, or Dropbox) can be used to apply these settings to the different computers that users access.

segment.source: Enhanced Support for VDI Mode
segment.target: Enhanced Support for VDI Mode

segment.source: UE-V 2.1 includes support for VDI sessions that are shared among end users.
segment.target: UE-V 2.1 includes support for VDI sessions that are shared among end users.

segment.source: As an administrator, you can register and configure a special VDI template, which ensures that UE-V keeps all of its functionality intact for non-persistent VDI sessions.
segment.target: As an administrator, you can register and configure a special VDI template, which ensures that UE-V keeps all of its functionality intact for non-persistent VDI sessions.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If you do not enable VDI mode for non-persistent VDI sessions, certain features do not work, such as back-up/restore and LKG.
segment.target: If you do not enable VDI mode for non-persistent VDI sessions, certain features do not work, such as back-up/restore and LKG.

segment.source: Administrative Backup and Restore
segment.target: Administrative Backup and Restore

segment.source: You can restore additional settings when a user adopts a new device by putting a settings location template in backup or roam (default) profile using the Set-UevTemplateProfile PowerShell cmdlet.
segment.target: You can restore additional settings when a user adopts a new device by putting a settings location template in backup or roam (default) profile using the Set-UevTemplateProfile PowerShell cmdlet.

segment.source: This lets computer settings sync to the new computer, in addition to user settings.
segment.target: This lets computer settings sync to the new computer, in addition to user settings.

segment.source: Templates assigned to the backup profile are backed up for that device and configured on a per-device basis.
segment.target: Templates assigned to the backup profile are backed up for that device and configured on a per-device basis.

segment.source: Manage Administrative Backup and Restore in UE-V 2.x provides more information.
segment.target: Manage Administrative Backup and Restore in UE-V 2.x provides more information.

segment.source: Synchronization for Additional Windows Settings
segment.target: Synchronization for Additional Windows Settings

segment.source: UE-V now synchronizes touch keyboard personalization, the spelling dictionary, and enables the App Switching for recent apps and screen edge settings to synchronize between Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 devices.
segment.target: UE-V now synchronizes touch keyboard personalization, the spelling dictionary, and enables the App Switching for recent apps and screen edge settings to synchronize between Windows 8 and Windows 8.1 devices.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for UE-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for UE-V?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
